courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development
courses.description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB to build responsive and scalable web applications.

courses.title: Data Science & Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn Python, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn, and TensorFlow to analyze data, create predictions, and build ML models.

courses.title: UI/UX Design
courses.description: Design stunning, user-friendly interfaces with Figma, Adobe XD, and design principles that enhance user experiences.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand network security, ethical hacking, and best practices to protect systems from threats and vulnerabilities.

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS & Azure
courses.description: Deploy, scale, and manage apps in the cloud using AWS and Microsoft Azure for real-world enterprise solutions.
